nissab_zakat_description: Restez informé sur la valeur actuelle du Nissab basée sur les prix de l'or et de l'argent pour un calcul précis de la Zakat.
zakat_calculator_description: Giving Zakat is a religious obligation for all eligible Muslims and is based on the current nisab values. These values can vary yearly, making Zakat computation challenging. To simplify this, we provide the nisab values for 2025 and a detailed Zakat calculator to help you determine your contribution. If you need a more in-depth understanding of how to calculate Zakat in Islam, visit our comprehensive guide.
